metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4492 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in exceptions.rb in the i18n gem before 0.6.6 for Ruby allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted I18n::MissingTranslationData.new call.

criterions.comment: ruby-i18n package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
